item.title: Are Krishana Phoschem Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Krishana Phoschem Ltd's latest results are strong, with a 116.79% increase in revenue and a 62.30% rise in net profit year-on-year. However, profit margins have contracted, indicating some operational challenges that need monitoring. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Krishana Phoschem Q3 FY26: Stellar Growth Momentum Continues with 62% Profit Surge
item.description: Krishana Phoschem Limited, a Rajasthan-based fertiliser and specialty chemicals manufacturer, has delivered an exceptional third quarter performance for FY2026, reporting a net profit of ₹33.32 crores—a remarkable 62.29% year-on-year surge from ₹20.53 crores in Q3 FY25. The company's stock, currently trading at ₹494.85 with a market capitalisation of ₹2,979 crores, has demonstrated extraordinary momentum over the past year with returns of 160.42%, significantly outperforming the Sensex's 8.21% gain by a staggering 152 percentage points. Time: 7 hours ago

item.title: Raj Rayon Industries Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Raj Rayon Industries Ltd, a small-cap player in the Garments & Apparels sector, witnessed a sharp decline on 12 Jan 2026 as it hit its lower circuit price limit, closing at ₹21.41. The stock faced intense selling pressure, resulting in a maximum daily loss of 1.97%, reflecting growing investor concerns amid deteriorating technical and fundamental indicators. Time: 7 hours ago

item.title: Blue Coast Hotels Ltd Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Blue Coast Hotels Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Hotels & Resorts sector, witnessed intense selling pressure on 12 Jan 2026, hitting its lower circuit limit with a sharp 4.97% decline to close at ₹30.78. The stock’s performance starkly underperformed its sector and broader market benchmarks, reflecting mounting investor concerns and panic selling in a highly volatile trading session. Time: 7 hours ago
